C

Card - Class in poker
Card class is a representation of a standard poker playing card.
Card(int, int) - Constructor for class poker.Card
Constructor for a card Face values and suits are sent to constructor as a integers, and converted to appropriate String values

D

dealOneCard() - Method in class poker.Deck
Returns a Card from the top of the deck, there are any cards in the deck.
Deck - Class in poker
 
Deck() - Constructor for class poker.Deck
The Deck constructor produces the 52-card deck, with cards in ascending order (Ace high).

G

getCardCount() - Method in class poker.Deck
Getter method for the size of deck.
getCardList() - Method in class poker.Deck
Getter method for the card list in the deck.
getNumber() - Method in class poker.Card
Getter method for the card's face value.
getSuit() - Method in class poker.Card
Getter method for the card's suit.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class poker.Deck
Main method to test Deck class and associated methods.

P

poker - package poker
 

S

shuffle() - Method in class poker.Deck
Shuffles all cards in the deck and distributes them randomly throughout the deck.
